name: Hans-Georg Gruber
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: using javascript in Marketing Automation for forms. Validation of forms. Javascript for Campaign tracking accross several pages. Interested in qQery and validation libraries. Interested in handing over of variables across sites. Interested in CMS / JS.
what_can_i_contribute: javascript on forms, javascript for Marketing Automation, what is Marketing Automation and where does Javascript fit in?, How can the big Marketing Automation Players like Oracle, Salesforce and Marketo be enhanced via Javascript, what are possible use cases? Form validation
